snippet.title: Xenotheria Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist Today: https://bit.ly/44Showu

Visit https://www.xenotheria.com/ for more information.

Xenotheria is set on the frontier mining planet of Wolf Prime. But things take a dark turn when an unknown force starts pulling spaceships out of the sky. Leaving behind a trail of devastation and chaos. As the planet becomes littered with wreckage and danger at every turn, it’s up to Squig, a shipyard worker and denizen of Wolf Prime to rally a team of survivors and embark on a perilous journey to uncover the truth behind cataclysm. With the help of his trusty friend Norton, Squig must use all his skills and courage to save the planet from certain destruction.

Are you ready to join the fight?

Credits:

Developed by Ganymede Games - https://www.ganymede.games/

Trailer by Radikal Studio - https://www.radikalstudio.pro/
